qas.question: What is the student population of University of Westminster?
How many international universities operate in London?
In what suburb is the American International University in London located?
What is Europe's largest university for degrees in communication and performing arts?

context: A number of universities in London are outside the University of London system, including Brunel University, City University London, Imperial College London, Kingston University, London Metropolitan University, Middlesex University, University of East London, University of West London and University of Westminster, (with over <a0_0>34,000<a0_0/> students, the largest unitary university in London), London South Bank University, Middlesex University, <a3_0>University of the Arts London<a3_0/> (the largest university of art, design, fashion, communication and the performing arts in Europe), University of East London, the University of West London and the University of Westminster. In addition there are <a1_0>three<a1_0/> international universities in London – Regent's University London, <a2_0>Richmond<a2_0/>, The American International University in London and Schiller International University.
